system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice negation by Advising a friend about dates with 'don't'. I want to ensure that I can form negative imperatives of main verbs with 'don't' + main verb. Clauses: imperatives For example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) have a first date tomorrow and are nervous. Ask me to help you list What not to do. Use short sentences. (e.g. “I’m anxious about the date. What should I not do?”, “This is my first date in years. What shouldn’t I say?”, “Can you tell me What else not to do?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Advising a friend about dates with 'don't', using, for example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: "Hi! I’m really nervous about my date tomorrow. It’s my first date in years. Can you tell me what I don’t do?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Hi! I’m so nervous about my date tomorrow. It’s my first date in years. Can you tell me what I shouldn’t do?"

conversation.content: Don’t worry too much! Don’t be late. Don’t forget to be yourself. Don’t talk only about yourself. Don’t use your phone too much. Don’t forget to listen. Don’t interrupt. Don’t forget to have fun!

"Thanks! That helps. What else shouldn’t I do? Should I avoid wearing something too fancy? Should I avoid ordering messy food? Should I avoid talking about my ex? Should I remember to smile? Can you tell me more?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Thanks! That helps. What else shouldn’t I do? Don’t I wear something too fancy? Don’t I order messy food? Don’t I talk about my ex? Don’t I forget to smile? Can you tell me more?"

conversation.content: Don’t wear anything uncomfortable. Don’t order messy food. Don’t talk about your ex. Don’t forget to smile. Don’t be negative. Don’t rush things. Don’t forget to compliment them. Don’t overthink it.
"Got it! This is really helpful. What else? Should I avoid being too quiet? Should I avoid asking a lot of questions? Should I remember to be polite? Can you give me more advice?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Got it! This is really helpful. What else? Should I avoid being too quiet? Should I avoid asking too many questions? Should I remember to be polite? Can you give me more advice?"

conversation.content: Don’t be too quiet. Don’t ask too many personal questions. Don’t forget to be polite. Don’t dominate the conversation. Don’t forget to show interest. Don’t fidget too much. Don’t forget to thank them. Don’t stress too much.
"Thanks so much for all your advice! I feel more prepared now. Don’t worry, I’ll remember everything you said. Don’t forget to wish me luck! I’ll let you know how it goes. Bye for now!"
Don’t forget to have fun! Don’t stress too much. Good luck! Let me know how it goes. Bye!
"Good job! You’ve completed the task. You gave great advice, and I feel much better now. Talk to you later! Bye!"
